column4: Hi, I setup a VNC server but am getting a connection error. Can someone help?
are the right ports open / forwarded on the router
there is no router on ubuntu machine how can I check if a port is open in netstat the program is running
oh all ports are closed until a service opens it up.  if ssh-server is on the ubuntu machine, you should be able to ssh to it
how do I do that connect to 127.0.0.1 ?
I have ssh access on ubuntu machine how would I get vnc working?
that's where youd find a site if you had a web server running on your computer
are you trying to get into windows or into ubuntu?
from windows to ubuntu( connecting to ubuntu)
does the windows machine have any outbound ports blocked?
ive never used vnc, im just trying to think of why things wouldnt connect
is the vnc server running on the ubuntu machine?
what port does vnc run on? are you aiming for the right port from windows?
and do you have a vnc client on windows?
vnc runnning on 5901 I think thats default? tighvnc viewr on windows
computertech99 how do I check if a port is open and connectable?
